resources.string: This is where the current song will shown include the full details and action buttons
This is current song with full details: name,album,playlist, and song actions:play,pause,forward,backwward,next,previous
This is where the Artist information present: name, birthday, list of albums etc
This is where the Album information present: year, producer etc
This is where the Playlist information present: create by who, tracklist
This is where the Search screen present, here the user will be able to search and discover artists, albums, tracks and more
This is where the Store screen present, the user can purchae via 3rd party PayPal/Other the items
